roleset.name: emphasize too much
roleset.note: OVEREMPHASIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overemphasize' based on transformation of 'emphasize' frames. (from overemphasize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: context? what context?
example.text: ``One can hardly overemphasize the importance of her rear end,'' Ms. Rose writes.
example.arg: the importance of her rear end

example.name: ARG2
example.text: At the hearing on the posttrial motion, defendant's attorney argued that allowing the jury to rehear B.C.'s testimony unfairly overemphasized it to the jury.
example.arg: allowing the jury to rehear B.C.'s testimony
